title: T206, CJs, M116s etc.  HOFers - ALL SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206, CJs, M116s etc.  HOFers - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
Cards below are for sale; emails given priority.  Please email with any questions or scan requests.  Thanks!

Am open to trades for a few 19th century HOFers I'm looking for.
Please add $5 for USPS Priority with Delivery Confirmation. Payal add 3%.

1915 Cracker Jack Walter Johnson SGC 40 - Card would be EX if not for a wrinkle only visible on the back corner. SOLD
T202 Tinker/Evers/Chance SGC 10 - All 3 HOF on one classic card.  Card has a tear and a stain. $75 SOLD
V61 Marranville SGC 30 (type 2) - Horizontal card of the HOFer; sharp corners and one crease. $100 SOLD
M116 Connie Mack PSA 6 - difficult card to find in high grade.  Wet ink transfer on front. $800 SOLD 
M116 Frank Chance (Pastel) SGC 20 - NM+ front with his position written on the back. $150 SOLD
M116 Mordecai Brown (Pastel) SGC 20 - NM+ front on this tough series 2 pastel version.  $290 SOLD
M116 Jack Coombs SGC 50 - fantastic card; tiny chip on front bottom left corner seems to be what reduced the grade.  SOLD
T205 A Latham VG-EX - Severe horizontal miscut $70 SOLD
T206 Fiene VG $20 SOLD
R312 Joe DiMaggio trimmed - nice DiMaggio rookie which has been evenly trimmed top and bottom $150 SOLD
1950 Bowman Larry Doby G-VG. $18 SOLD
